title: AI Gate Online – Different World Samurai - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Calm Protagonist   Cheats   Dense Protagonist   Dragons   Elves   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Guilds   Level System   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Samurai   Sword And Magic   Transported into a Game World   Weak to Strong
author: Touno Tsumugu   桐野紡
description: High school student, Ryoi Takashi, plays a VRMMO, Al Gate Online as a samurai, he was then blown into a world that is similar to Al Gate Online. An elf hero has decided to become his family, with a pet wolf, he can have adventures with the woman swordsman, while holding modern knowledge, it’s his story of wandering in a different world.>
